message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE

This paper is about using Roget's Thesaurus as a resource for Natural Language Processing, which falls under the category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). The paper discusses using Roget's for computing semantic similarity (cs.IR) and building lexical chains (cs.LG), which are both common tasks in NLP. Additionally, the paper involves designing classes and data structures to computerize the Thesaurus, which falls under the category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper compares the results of using Roget's to other systems, which involves statistical techniques (cs.NE).
